entities.name: wizard baruffio
entities.description: A wizard who made a mistake in saying the magic words, resulting in a buffalo landing on him.

entities.name: buffalo
entities.description: An animal that landed on Wizard Baruffio's chest after he mispronounced the magic words.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student who was trying to cast a spell with Seamus, but had trouble getting it right.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: A student who was trying to cast a spell with Harry, but ended up setting fire to the feather instead.

relationships.description: The buffalo landed on Wizard Baruffio's chest after he mispronounced the magic words.
Harry used his hat to put out the fire that Seamus had set on the feather.
Seamus accidentally set fire to the feather with his wand, causing Harry to have to put it out.
